content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://lastpass.com https://*.lastpass.com https://lastpass.eu https://*.lastpass.eu https://www.youtube.com; img-src 'self' data: https://lastpass.com https://lastpass.eu https://rodan.lastpass.com https://dev.lastpass.com; connect-src https://lastpass.com https://lastpass.eu https://rodan.lastpass.com https://dev.lastpass.com http://lastpass.com http://lastpass.eu http://rodan.lastpass.com http://dev.lastpass.com wss://*.lastpass.com ws://*.lastpass.com wss://*.lastpass.eu ws://*.lastpass.eu; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://lastpass.com https://lastpass.eu https://rodan.lastpass.com https://dev.lastpass.com
description: LastPass is a free password manager and form filler.  LastPass is also available for Firefox, Internet Explorer, Opera and Safari.
name: LastPass
